price: Mar’yam, berε woho ase ma wo Wura Nyankopͻn na fa w’anim butu fͻm, na ka wͻn a wͻ’bͻ wͻn mu aseε no ho ne wͻn mͻ momu ase.
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
